class.name: com.navis.argo.business.xps.model.EcEvent

property.name: eceventLocType

property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: eceventLocSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: eceventPosOperationalPosId

property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position when che is unladen

property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id when che is unladen

property.name: eceventUnladenLocSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location when che is unladen

property.name: eceventLadenLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position when che is laden

property.name: eceventLadenLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id when che is laden

property.name: eceventLadenLocSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location when che is laden

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.model.Complex

property.meta: complex name

property.meta: time zone id

property.meta: public

many-to-one.name: cpxOperator

property.meta: facility Id, unique within the Complex

many-to-one.name: fcyRoutingPoint
many-to-one.meta: Routing point associated with this facility

property.name: fcyTeuGreen
property.meta: Number of TEU in facility at 'green' level: beyond this ops become somewhat affected

property.name: fcyTeuYellow
property.meta: Number of TEU in facility at 'yellow' level (i.e. max with acceptable ops problem)

property.name: fcyTeuRed
property.meta: Max TEU in facility

property.name: jmsProvider
property.meta: type of JMS provider from which we get SNX messages

property.name: jmsProviderUrl
property.meta: URL of JMS provider

property.name: jmsInUri
property.meta: Inbound URI on Jms Provider from where we get the SNX messages

property.name: jmsPollInUri
property.meta: Low-priority inbound URI on Jms Provider from where we poll for the SNX messages

property.name: jmsPollFrequency
property.meta: The polling frequency on the low-priority inbound queue.

property.name: jmsOutUri
property.meta: Outbound URI of fcyJmsProvider that we use to establish JMS communication

many-to-one.name: fcyRouteResolverRules
many-to-one.meta: Top node in a EntityMappingPredicate tree defining the route resolver rules for this facility

many-to-one.name: fcyrelayToFacility

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.model.CarrierVisit
class.meta: proxy representing a call of a carrier at a facility

property.name: cvId
property.meta: carrier visit id: carrier identifier (vessel/voyage, truck license, etc.)

property.name: cvCustomsId
property.meta: external reference id for this visit (e.g. customs' ID at PNC)

property.name: cvCarrierMode
property.meta: the carrier transport mode (vessel, rail or truck)

property.name: cvVisitNbr
property.meta: number to disambuguate the visit: 1=first visit, 2=second, etc. (used for trucks and railcars only)

property.name: cvVisitPhase
property.meta: Visit phase (CREATED, INBOUND ARRIVED, ...)

many-to-one.name: cvOperator
many-to-one.meta: The primary operator of this carrier visit.

many-to-one.name: cvComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex at which this carrier will call

many-to-one.name: cvFacility
many-to-one.meta: The Facility at which this carrier will call (if known)

many-to-one.name: cvNextFacility
many-to-one.meta: The next Facility this carrier will call. If null, assumption is carrier leaves complex on departure

property.name: cvATA
property.meta: Actual Time of Arrival

property.name: cvATD
property.meta: Actual Time of Departure

many-to-one.name: cvCvd
many-to-one.meta: The VisitDetails asscoiated with this CarrierVisit. May be null.

property.name: cvdTimeFirstAvailability
property.meta: Date/time discharged cargo is available for pickup

property.name: cvdInboundFirstFreeDay
property.meta: Storage First Free Day for inbound cargo

many-to-one.name: cvdService
many-to-one.meta: The service of the carrier. Nullable, as truck carriers don't have a service.

many-to-one.name: cvdItinerary
many-to-one.meta: The itinerary of the carrier (most often same as carrier's service's itineray). Nullable, as truck carriers don't have an itinerary.

property.name: cvdInCallNumber
property.meta: Inbound Call Number

property.name: cvdOutCallNumber
property.meta: Outbound Call Number

property.name: cvdDataSource
property.meta: Source of this carrier visit record

property.name: cvdTimePeriodicStart
property.meta: First Periodic Visit time

property.name: cvdTimePeriodicEnd
property.meta: Last Periodic Visit time

property.name: cvdDurationPeriodicRecur
property.meta: Periodic Visit interval

property.name: cvdLifeCycleState
property.meta: public
